name: SUPER LIFTPIA
description:
Pick up the enemy and throw it!
This is an action game drawn with dots that gives you a nostalgic feel.
The difficulty level is set to low.

The main character of this game, Lifton, is skilled at "lifting up" his enemies.
If you step on an enemy and flip them over, you can lift them up.
Enemies can be lifted up in two layers.

The lifted enemy can be swapped up and down with the up key. And you can throw the enemies in the lower row by pressing the X key.
If you lift a specific enemy, that enemy may exhibit mysterious abilities.


*This game does not use any text other than the title and staff roll.
